bike.description: All new Stumpjumper FSR M5 manipulated alloy frame w/ ORE TT/DT, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, DMD Direct Mount F. Der, replaceable derailleur hanger, disc only, 120mm travel

components.description: Specialized AFR Shock w/ remote Trail Tune inertia valve, adj rebound and Brain Fade, 7.25x1.75"
Shimano M770 XT, DMD top swing
Alloy collar w/ QR, 34.9mm clamp ID
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
